sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Less-&less-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, install, mv, rm, touch Grep: egrep, grep Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Make: make Sed: sed Sh-utils: expr, hostname, uname Textutils: cat, tr
